title: Design and Implementation of Distance Education Operation Models

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital literacy and educational operation experience
context.additional_context: Need to strengthen infrastructure-building and operational capabilities for remote education to revitalize community-based education

learning_goals: Plan educational curricula by applying the five stages of the distance education operation model: analysis, design, development, implementation, and evaluation.
Establish customized distance education strategies considering learner/instructor profiles and organizational environments.
Design effective blended learning approaches in technology-limited settings (smartphone-centric environments).

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
